column1: Little Goat Diner////On a warm summer day
column2: I underwent a 2-mile walk from my hotel
column4: in order to visit Little Goat (too cheap to hail a cab).  I had been saving Little Goat for my last stop during a mini-Chicago vacation
column5: looking forward to the visit all week.  I arrived around 10 AM on a weekday
column6: and was easily able to get a seat at the bar top. My server was very kind about my bulky suitcase
column7: and gently moved it against a wall.
